author: Michael Arnold
comment: Never resets the clock selector so I can change end time. App crashes opening settings from android wear app, galaxy note 4.                                                                        Also since this is a paid app can there be an option to remove the text "wait4it" from the watchface? Looks wayyyy too cluttered.

reply.author: nwg
reply.content: Thank you for the feedback. However, nobody else submitted such the bug. It would be great if you could send the crash report from your phone, since I can't reproduce it on my devices in any way. The app built with libraries updated to the latest versions will be available soon. Hope it's going to resolve your problem.
